title: Remove profile completion modal

requirements.text: Remove the profile completion modal that displays 'Complete Your Profile' with name and email fields from the application

quotes: Complete Your Profile Please provide your name and email to get started
can we remove this that keeps popping up coz we dont need it

acceptanceCriteria: The profile setup modal no longer appears for any user
Users can access the application without being prompted to complete profile information
No popup requesting name and email is displayed

requirements.text: Remove any conditional logic that triggers the profile completion modal based on missing user profile data
acceptanceCriteria: Application flow no longer checks for or enforces profile completion
User can navigate freely without profile setup interruptions

nonGoals: Modifying the underlying user profile data structure in the backend
Removing the profile setup component files themselves (they may be needed for other purposes)
Changing authentication or role selection flows
